MUCH smaller than expected. I bought one in gold that's twice the size, the shell has a ton of natural flash and half the price of this one. Plus it's genuine gold.  I tend to wear my silver jewelry more so I tried to find one set with silver and came across this one.  The pendant itself is decent quality. But.. I wish the shell had a bit more flash/color shift to it. I guess I just happened to receive one that has very little to it. Which is another massive disappointment especially for the price point. Had the shell had more color shift, I'd be okay with this purchase.  Genuine 925 setting. Also has the added safety measure of a pin through the shell, so the silver clamp setting won't slide or easily fall off. Genuine Shell. About the size of an earring.  As with most pendants these days, UNFORTUNATELY they come with the useless display chains. (The one I bought from a different seller that is set in gold, came with a beautiful sturdy gold box chain. For HALF the price of this one!) Meaning that you CANNOT wear this one straight out of the box. You'll definitely need to upgrade the chain immediately. Especially as this pendant has some weight to it. Hopefully you'll have a spare 925 chain, as otherwise you'll need to purchase one.  I'd highly recommend the seller include a good quality curb chain at the very least. They aren't expensive chains. Basically similar to the cheap one that comes with this pendant but great quality, so people can wear this necklace immediately.  I do think some people will like the size of the pendant hence me giving it 3 🌟's. And even moreso if they receive the shell how it should look.  I wouldn't purchase this again and wish I could get my money back, but unfortunately I'm stuck with it.  Based on having to switch out the chain so it can be worn, I cannot recommend. Were it $10-$15Cnd max, I could recommend it.  I dislike leaving negative reviews but no way no how is this worth $50Cnd. Highly recommend bypassing this particular piece. (Please excuse the yellowing of my hand in my photos. I have severe jaundice from genetic liver failure. )  Hopefully this helps..
